3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: Ugh. This place brings back unwelcome memories of a tadpole slipping behind my eye...
3.context: NodeContext: Distaste (in a place where people are infected with tadpoles)

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: Appalling. I am glad my memories of the infection are not so clear.
0.context: NodeContext: with a shudder, having heard a description of illithid infection

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Oh yes, I forgot - you had your love of the Absolute to mask the ugly parts.
2.context: NodeContext: Veiled criticism of a former enemy

1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
1.text: Do not call it love. It was poison.
1.context: NodeContext: quietly angry. Heavy emphasis on poison.
